tags.name: button-link
tags.doc: Renders a link, styled as a button.
tags.synopsis: render a link styled as a button

tags.name: large-well
tags.doc: Renders a well (highlighted panel) with large borders

pagesize.name: pagesize
pagesize.doc: Number of items in a page.

fragment.name: fragment
fragment.doc: Option fragment to add to links.

auto.name: auto
auto.doc: If yes, the enclosed block is called once per item. If no the block is called once, and you must supply content tags to render all the items.

dst.name: dst
dst.doc: The name to give to each item in the sequence.

page.name: page
page.doc: Current page to display (default retrieves page from the query string).

tags.name: search-input
tags.doc: A search input with cancel button

tags.name: small-well
tags.doc: Renders a well (highlighted panel) with smaller borders

tags.name: url
tags.doc: Renders a URL with a link.
